title: Has Jayce been played in competitive play in any region?

replies.body: I know he saw competitive play last season, not sure about this season as he's largely outclassed by other mid picks and doesn't offer a lot in top where typically you encounter a tank matchup.

Twice In EU.
12 times in Korea (LCK).
8 times in China (LPL)
Thanks! Could I ask if there's website that shows all these competitive statistics with champions like pick rate/ban rate etc.?

[Lolpedia](http://lol.gamepedia.com/League_of_Legends_Wiki)
[NA Split picks -No Playoffs](http://lol.gamepedia.com/2015_NA_LCS_Spring/Scoreboards/Round_Robin/Overview)
[EU Split picks -No Playoffs](http://lol.gamepedia.com/2015_EU_LCS_Spring/Scoreboards/Round_Robin/Overview)
[LCK Split Picks](http://lol.gamepedia.com/2015_LCK_Spring/Scoreboards/Round_Robin/Overview)
[LPL Split Picks Don't Forget to click the Show](http://lol.gamepedia.com/2015_LPL_Spring/Scoreboards/Round_Robin/Overview)
Yeah, he's been played in the LCS occasionally.
I used to play in euw server and I would see him a lot.
